title: AIML - Senior Software Engineer, ML Systems and Evaluation Engineering
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work...
description: You will own requirements, including 'proof of concept' development, and co-own the development roadmap...
preferred_qualifications: 5+ years of professional experience in software development, with a strong emphasis on designing, implementing, and optimizing large-scale data and compute-intensive pipelines, tools, and machine learning (ML) systems....
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $135,400 and $250,600, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
